item.title: 🐹 EvilBytecode/Ebyte-Go-Morpher (98 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: EvilBytecode

📝 Repository: EvilBytecode/Ebyte-Go-Morpher

📄 Descrizione: Ebyte-Go-Morpher is a Go program that parses, analyzes, and rewrites Go source code to apply multiple layers of obfuscation. It operates directly on the Go Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) and generates both obfuscated source files and runtime decryption logic.

⭐ Stelle: 98

🍴 Forks: 10

💻 Linguaggio: Go

🏷️ Topics: ast binary-protection golang-string obfuscate obfuscation protector

📜 Licenza: MIT License

⏰ Creato il: 2025-07-19T11:26:02Z

🔄 Ultimo Aggiornamento: 2025-08-12T11:48:45Z

]]>

item.title: 🐹 Cod-e-Codes/marchat (59 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: Cod-e-Codes

📝 Repository: Cod-e-Codes/marchat

📄 Descrizione: Lightweight terminal chat with separate server and client binaries, real-time WebSocket messaging, optional end-to-end encryption, plugin support, and file sharing. Built in Go with Bubble Tea and SQLite; PostgreSQL and MySQL support coming soon. Ideal for developers and small teams who want reliable, self-hosted chat with minimal ops overhead.

⭐ Stelle: 59

🍴 Forks: 4

💻 Linguaggio: Go

🏷️ Topics: bubbletea chat chat-app docker file-sharing go golang real-time self-hosted sqlite terminal tui websocket

📜 Licenza: MIT License

🔄 Ultimo Aggiornamento: 2025-08-12T21:38:05Z
